mapper.select: SELECT M_NO FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{m_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_GROUP_MEMBER (G_NO, M_NO, G_M_ROLE) VALUES (#{gNo}, #{mNo}, #{gMRole})
mapper.select: SELECT g.G_NO AS g_no, g.G_NAME AS g_name, g.G_IMG_NAME AS g_img_name, g.G_INFO AS g_info, g.G_CATEGORY AS g_category, g.G_MASTER_ID AS g_master_id, g.G_MAX_NUMBER AS g_max_number, g.G_LOCATION AS g_location, g.G_GOOD AS g_good, g.G_PUBLIC AS g_public, g.G_CONFIRM AS g_confirm, g.G_REGIST AS g_regist, g.G_REG_DATE AS g_reg_date, g.G_MOD_DATE AS g_mod_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_GROUP_MEMBER gm WHERE gm.G_NO = g.G_NO) AS memberCount FROM TBL_GROUP g WHERE g.G_NO IN ( SELECT gm.G_NO FROM TBL_GROUP_MEMBER gm WHERE gm.M_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{m_id}) );

SELECT g.G_NO AS g_no, g.G_NAME AS g_name, g.G_INFO AS g_info, g.G_CATEGORY AS g_category, g.G_LOCATION AS g_location, g.G_IMG_NAME AS g_img_name, g.G_CONFIRM AS g_confirm, g.G_MAX_NUMBER AS g_max_number, g.G_REG_DATE AS g_reg_date, g.G_CONFIRM AS g_confirm, g.G_PUBLIC AS g_public, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_GROUP_MEMBER WHERE G_NO = g.G_NO) AS memberCount, g.G_MASTER_ID AS g_master_id, m.M_NICKNAME AS g_master_nickname FROM TBL_GROUP g LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON g.G_MASTER_ID = m.M_NO WHERE g.G_NO = #{gNo}
